metadata.Title: CVE-2018-12558 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: The parse() method in the Email::Address module through 1.909 for Perl is vulnerable to Algorithmic complexity on specially prepared input, leading to Denial of Service. Prepared special input that caused this problem contained 30 form-field characters ("\f").

criterions.comment: libemail-address-perl package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.912-1').
